DOC.brief_summary: Active phase second stage labor corresponds period maternal expulsive effort ( i.e . push ) . An intensive management phase usual France . This study aim evaluate impact alternative `` moderate '' management push phase neonatal maternal issue mode delivery .
DOC.brief_title: Alternative Intensive Management Active Phase Second Stage Labor
DOC.detailed_description: Management active phase second stage labor evidence-based practice . Management phase differs country . In France , national guideline recommend limit maternal expulsive effort 30 minute ( grade C ) . Thus , physician ( midwife obstetrician ) encourage usually woman push 3 time per contraction push every contraction order deliver 30 minute time . This study aim evaluate impact alternative `` moderate '' management push phase neonatal maternal issue mode delivery . In intervention group , i.e . `` moderate '' push , woman encourage push 2 time per contraction , respect contraction without push limit push duration . The hypothesis `` moderate '' management active phase second stage allow decrease frequency neonatal morbidity birth , decrease frequency operative delivery increase maternal satisfaction .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria : primiparous woman singleton fetus fetal cephalic presentation â‰¥37 gestational week live fetus Patient epidural analgesia Major Female Women understand French Exclusion Criteria : Abnormal fetal heart rate require hasten childbirth cervical dilatation < 8 cm intrauterine fetal growth restriction < 5e percentile , Fetal malformation , history gynecological surgery uterine scar Women understand French , woman psychiatric condition contraindication intensive management active second stage ( severe myopia , respiratory cardiac failure ) affiliation social security scheme ( beneficiary assignee )
